code: import React from'react';import classes from'./MusicPlayer.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MusicPlayer=_ref=>{let{socket,text,id,playedStatus}=_ref;const changePlayedStatuc=()=>{socket.emit('changeMusicStatus',{id:id,newStatus:!playedStatus});};const goNextSongs=()=>{socket.emit('goNextSongs',id);};const goPrevSongs=()=>{socket.emit('goPrevSongs',id);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.player,children:[text===''?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.songTitle,children:["Now Playing: ",text]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.controls,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>goPrevSongs(),children:"Previous"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>changePlayedStatuc(),children:playedStatus?'Pause':'Resume'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>goNextSongs(),children:"Next"})]})]});};export default MusicPlayer;
